comments.comment: shout out to Marzia, her amazing editing and beautiful taste made these videos a hundred times better
Seeing Bjorn smile and hearing his laughter melts my heart, what a sweet boy
16:10 that’s such a good family photo they all look so happy and Bjorn is just crying
I don't know if you guys know this, but whenever we can see shots of Felix and Marzia walking together, it's actually Bjorn filming them. Such a talented kid, he's gonna be a great filmmaker one day.
When Björn gets older he can look back on these videos and see just how much his parents love each other - and him. That makes me so happy.
6:40 Bjorn's laugh is like an old man... Felix, listen, he laughs just like YOU
Björn's smile is really adorable
I love how felix slowly starts to look more and more like his dad over the years.
Felix’s “DAD” sweater makes me cry a little it’s so cute this family makes me so warm and fuzzy inside

Honestly grateful that Marzia is also included and is ok with being in these little life updates/vlogs. It's very nice of your family to allow us into your life like this. It is a beautiful family and journey that you have been on Felix, we are all proud of you and Marzia ️ big pps all around.
Hearing Marzia being silly to make Björn laugh is the best, I hope parenthood is treating you & Marzia greatly!
I love how Pewds is single-handedly boosting Japan's tourism with his scenic vids, Marzia is such an amazing photographer and editor.
Seeing Björn, Marzia, and Pewds laughing together was probably the most purest thing I've ever seen.  makes me so happy

Everybody keeps on saying "2018 was peak Pewds content", well i somewhat agree, but at the same time, I actually think this the peak time for Felix in his life. He seems a lot more happier and he got everything he ever wanted, married Marzia, had a kid, experience Japan in such a great way while relaxing. I'm happy for Pewds
15:38 It was so wholesome I teared up a bit. Felix is really now a father.
Björn is such a happy baby! I want to cry but my cheeks hurt from smiling so much! Hearing him and Marzia laugh in the back of the car is sooooooo cute and wonderful!
Thanks for keeping us in mind while you enjoy your new life, pewds.  Many blessings to you.
Hearing Björn’s little baby babble in the background always makes me tear up, it makes me so happy for you both. Your family is so beautiful pewds ️

I absolutely love the pure joy on Felix's face as he listens to his wife and child lauging. I'vebeen following Felix since the screaming at a gold statue phase. He came so far, and i am really proud of the man he became!

I wrote a message quite some time ago about my wife who had a bad type of cancer in her spine 2016 and about our dream going to Japan and how these kind of videos has made it so it almost feels like we have been there, and i just wanted to share an update. 

Shes healthier than ever and 1 month ago we received our first baby <3, a little girl. My wife had a 50/50 chance of being paralyzed from the waist down and they said that the cancer would most likely appear again within just a couple of years due to it being incredibly aggresive, and the odds of us ever getting a baby the natural way was very unlikely due to the very heavy treatments she went on. Fast forward to 2023, we have a babygirl, 2 dogs a house, both of us are very health and living our best life. So to all of you fighters out there, as long as there is life, there is hope, keep fighting. 

Thanks for these videos Felix, me and Caroline love them.

Im sure Pewds doesnt pay mind to the comments now but I really have to say; seeing you for years and now watching this makes me bawl and cry so hard. I need to thank you for being the most consistent part of my life; for giving me a wonderful distraction. Thank you so so much for letting us see this <3

Felix and Marzia are living the closest thing you can get to a Studio Ghibli film. These lovely videos are like looking through a window on a cold winter day and seeing a beautiful warm home full of love and happiness. It’s such a wonderful feeling knowing that this kind of life can and is being achieved. Thank you for sharing your experiences with us!

I try not to be envious, but sometimes I can’t help but envy Felix, wonderful wife and child, living in Japan and enjoying some of the most beautiful corners of the world. It’s still so surreal to me to think I was watching him on some janky camera playing amnesia years and years ago.
- Pewds literally won life.
Felix' life has become a wholesome light novel from Japan and we love to comsume it. Great Editiing, Marzia!
The old man's laugh coming from a baby is so cute. :) You guys bring so much joy to the world!
"Pooping at the worst times possible" he's just like his father
The cutest family in the world

I grew up with Pewds and am now 6 months pregnant myself 

I can’t wait to have these little adventures with my daughter too when she’s born. 

These videos help me a lot to relax and not stress over the pregnancy or my future. 

Thank you for everything. 

edit: the replies are the sweetest thing. thank you so much to everyone :(
all the best!!
14:15 Probably cried because of the air pressure change. nice to see the chillest family having a nice time!

I love how Pewdiepie now primarily does videos that reflect more of his personality and personal style and you can see that he rlly enjoys making them. Love the warmth and happiness u can feel in this video
6:50 the happiness in his face is so contagious

2:10 I got so proud of myself for how far my Japanese has come  A kid was saying "aka-chan", which is how they say "baby", so that little girl must've been saying something along the lines of "A baby, look it's a baby!" Kawaii desu!
15:34 I don’t know why I started tearing up. I’m just so happy for Felix, Marzia and Björn
I've always hated family vlogs but these completely changed my opinion, this is just too wholesome and cute. I'm so grateful to be able to see his adventures with his family in Japan
Dude.  I havent watched you in at least 10 years.  Makes me so damn happy finding this channel again and seeing how much youve grown!!!   I hope you and your family have an amazing lifetime!!

I want Pewds to live the life he wants whether he keeps making videos or not, cause he's earned it at this point, but i really hope we keep getting videos like this forever. These have a very nostalgic family home video feel to me, they're just really comforting fun videos, and i also just want to see Björn grow up, and i just know that these will be amazing videos for them to look back on with him when he's older.
It’s so cool to see Felix with a child after all these years

10:35 made me smile so much because of how cute that was. I watched your videos on an old account of mine and decided to see what been happening with you recently and I love how far you came as a person and those improvements are amazing. Happy new year :)
I can’t lie, I’m in a really low point in my life right now. Seeing you guys so happy brings a smile to my face, so thank you. I hope to be this happy one day
Bjorn just slowly turning into mini Felix is so cute.

12:55 wish all dads give that kind of comfort/assurance.

"Don't be scared, Bjorn. Daddy's got you"
This whole video was beautiful! But the opening, with the music, filter, and the scenery, gave me chills! Amazing editing, Marzia!!

The Evolution of PewDiePie continues but watching him relax so easily and happily into dadhood may be the most satisfying stage so far. Meanwhile, Björn's wonderfully good-natured chill is the best possible proof of the excellent home life Felix & Marzia are providing for him.  These three are a case where everything clicks perfectly and it's a joy to watch.

The fact I remember him playing videos in that small flat in Sweden to now him being a dad and still with the same woman makes me so beyond happy for these two complete strangers who I consider family

these videos make me cry. I have watched your videos since the amnesia days. I cannot express how proud I am of both of you. I still remember the video when you talked about how you and Marzia met. it is absolutely crazy that you guys are here now. it feels like I'm watching my good friends succeed in life. I really wish you, Marzia, and Bjorn all the best the world has to offer you guys. So so proud of you guys, and I can't wait to keep watching you, Marzia and Bjorn grow :')
A Japanese baby with a Swedish dad and an Italian mom who will learn English, Swedish,  Italian, and Japanese. Truly an international baby of mystery.

i broke down crying when i saw this video. i used to watch your channel all of the time when i was younger, and seeing you and marzia with your own little bundle of joy just warms my heart so much. i wish you and your growing family all of the love in the world.
All of us growing up together with Felix, and now seeing him like this really makes me shed tears of joy :,)
I love to see snippets of Felix's life, it's so calming and makes me want to live longer in the hopes that I too will have something like that
It was about 8 years ago, I was watching Pewd's to improve my English. Seeing him now just like that hits me in a different way.
Thinking back all the videos and phases of Felix, this version of family friendly Felix is my favourite.
It's just so wholesome to see someone who carried my childhood become such an amazing husband and father.

Incredibly proud to see how far you've come since I started watching you when I was a kid and you had under 1 million subscribers and now as an adult. You have been an extremely important character in my life and I'm sure for tons of others as well. Seeing you now with a child and a wife has been truly honoring because I feel like I've been there for all of it. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for making my childhood great through all of the bad times and for still bringing joy to my life, you are truly my favorite youtuber and one of the most influential people in my life. Proud to say that I'm a bro for life!
I just realised Bjorn has the chance to know 4 languages fluently. English, Swedish, Italian and Japanese. That’s sooo cool

Thank you felix and marzia for allowing us these short but respectful of privacy glimpse into your lives. With every video we are overjoyed on how happy you three are. Such a happy nostalgic mood. Wishing you all so much peace and happiness.
When i see felix and bjorn's identical eyes i feel so happy for him and his lil family. Thank you so much to keep sharing some happiness with us :')
So happy to see Felix and Marzia having a very happy life with their tiny family in Japan
The whole “police are here for you” is the most typical dad joke. My dad would say that all the time lol

Omg, I love seeing Bjorn in his little cold weather outfits! And seeing him play with your glasses and meet your eyes when you side-eyed him, so adorable! Thank you so much for sharing these moments with us! I am so happy for you and Marzia and Bjorn and the puggies! <3

今回もめちゃくちゃ癒された〜🫶
リフトの写真全員可愛すぎ最高
I love the random adventure update man, lifes been difficult this last year and it really is like catching up with a friend. Thanks pewds :D
The photo of them on the ski lift together had me so teary-eyed <3 Genuinely one of those photos that really captures the love that'll last a lifetime :)
Ever since Pewds and Marzia moved to Japan, I feel emotional in all the videos being uploaded. So glad to see them being happy and enjoying life

Honestly, the luckiest kid in the world. To have such loving caring parents, who love each other so much. Always happy to see the three of you having the time of your lives. Just be happy as you are. Best wishes to the happy family
私も伊東と熱海が好きで、子どものときから何回も行ってます。大室山リフトとかほんとにほのぼのして、懐かしい！暖かい気候と海の幸、みかん、ハイレベルな美術館など、魅力がたくさんあります。世界に紹介してくれてありがとう。
幸せな雰囲気が画面越しからも伝わってきます。これからも日本での生活を楽しんでね️️️

I've watching Pewdiepie since 10, his videos saving my life through very stress, depress, abusive and painful years. Pewds has everything he deserves, hope he will always be safe and happy. I'm happy for you, and thank you, thank you so much for everything.

I was worried that you would stop making videos like this after your kid was born, but now we're experiencing some of the best and most wholesome content that you've ever made. Its so wonderfully joyous, thank you for sharing a little bit of your lives with us.

Bjorn is so adorable and pewds looks like he's having the time of his life being a daddy and an amazing one at that. When Bjorn was laughing i started to giggle along and after getting diagnosed with heart failure i really needed a video like this to smile and laugh you and marzia and baby bjorn are the best family I've seen on yt i wish you guys nothing but the best. Thank you for all the laughs over the years it's been fun and watching felix from then to now is just mindblowing. I love these videos these travel type videos so calming and just a joy to watch. I've been watching pewds for over 10 yrs now i think longer since he started youtube i remember when he did the bully playthrough those were some good times. Much love to all 3 of you and i hope you have a wonderful holiday
It brings me tears of joy watching pewds so happy after all this years.
Hey PewDiePie, I am so happy <3
Really brings a tear to the eye watching his life now
This is so cool to see pewdiepie has come so far
These truly are some of my favorite videos. Seeing how happy they are as a family just feels so healing to me
This is by far my favourite series of videos you have ever made. It's wonderful to see the joy of family and fatherhood in such a happy chill way.
Seeing Felix happy and in a family gives me so much joy. Your content got me through so many tough times and I wish you all the happiness and luck in the world.
I like how the videos are always with such a wholesome vibe, but the Felix will say something out of the blue like "Don't drop the baby, and this is the chance". A true father
Im loving this Dad/Japan arc. It genuinely uplifts my day! Thank you for the vids :)
i cannot put into words how happy i am for this family
You can already tell Bjorn's laugh is similar like his father. I'm happy Marzia is including in this video, I really miss her so much

This video makes me feel nostalgic.
Atami and Izu are typical places for Tokyoites to spend their vacation in in summer and I’ve been there many times with my family in my childhood.
Everything’s outdated but taking walk in the sparse town/beach in the morning was oddly inspiring even as a kid.

Thank you pewds for sharing this video🥹
These videos i find so touching. Just the vibe of these videos are prefect. I dont watch a lot of youtube anymore except for these. Thnx <3
Felix has over the years become one of the coolest YouTubers out there, bro’s lifestyle oozes class
Technically pewds and marzia have a japanese baby since he was born and being raised there. What a crazy life to have , so glad i can watch them live the best life, they deserve it.  Love you guys!!!
13:30 dang that sunset is gorgeous
항상 영상보고 웃고 행복한 시간을 보내는 거 같아요! 우울하고 힘들고 삶이 지칠 때 보면 힐링이 되고 많이 웃을 수 있고 힘도 나네요! 저도 다른 사람에게 좋은 기운을 주는 유튜버가 됐으면 좋겠네요

god. the youtuber of all our childhoods has gone from gaming every day to moving to a new country, getting married and being a father, getting a new hobby. its so crazy and im so happy for him and his family <3

Watching Felix from back in the day, him finding love and getting married, to now where we can watch him as a dad brings me so much joy. Like watching your older brother grow up. Please continue to upload videos like this.

i love how calming this content is. such a nice break from the majority of social media. i’ve been a fan since 2012 and will be entering fatherhood soon and seeing pewds be a dad is inspiring and motivating. thanks for being a great role model over the years
This makes my heart and soul happy seeing them together now as a family. I remember him when pewds play horror games in the dark in 2010's time flies so fast.

growing up you were my secondary father figure and in a way helped raise me and shape who I have become today, through the controversies, the 'chillifying' of your content, doing what you actually wanna do, and now raising Bjorn as a great father.

Thanks dad, wish you many more years of happiness and prosperity!
Feels like watching someone close to you achieve their life goals with videos like this.
wow seeing you're happy with ur smol family make me want to cry man (happy tears) :) Merry Christmas to Felix, Marzia and little baby <3
5:13 this is too cute it's illegal to be that much cute
Felix just shows how cool it is to be parents
I just love seeing this happy, humble, well rounded guy live his best life. I feel like he deserves every bit of joy he seems to be experiencing right now.
